arts.sum: Mikel Arteta's Arsenal will be out to equal a 38-year record and also set a new club Premier League first in Saturday's intriguing showdown with Sunderland at the Stadium of Light.

arts.ttl: Sunderland vs Arsenal – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: High-flying Sunderland host league leaders Arsenal today, aiming to continue their best start to a top-flight season since 1999. The newly-promoted Black Cats have turned the Stadium of Light into a fortress. Indeed, they remain unbeaten at home this season (W3, D2). Consequently, this match provides a huge test of their European credentials.
